content: and smaller needles co 78 stitches and join to work in the round making sure not to twist your work place stitch marker for bor ribbing *k3 p2 k1 p1 9 times k1 p2 repeat from * to bor marker work 12 rounds set up round switch to larger needles *k3 p2 k4 p1 k2 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 repeat from * to bor marker cable pattern *…* pattern repeat round 1 *k3 p2 k4 p1 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc 2/1 lpc p1 k4 p2* round 2 *k3 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 k2 p1 k4 p2* round 3 *k3 p2 2/2 lc p2 2/2 rc p2 k2 p1 2/2 rc p2* round 4 *k3 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 k2 p1 k4 p2* round 5 *k3 p2 k4 p1 2/1 rpc 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc p1 k4 p2* round 6 *k3 p2 k4 p1 k2 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2* round 7 *k3 p2 2/2 lc p1 k2 p2 2/2 lc p2 2/2 rc p2* round 8 *k3 p2 k4 p1 k2 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2* work rounds 1-8 a total of 3 times cable crown decrease *…* pattern repeat round 1 *k3 ssp k1 ssk k1 p1 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc 2/1 lpc p1 k1 k2tog k1 p2tog* 12 sts decrease -66 sts round 2 *k3 p1 k3 ssp k4 p2tog k2 p1 k3 p1* 6 sts decrease -60 sts round 3 *k3 p1 2/1 lc p1 2/2 rc p1 k2tog p1 2/1rc p1* 3 sts decrease -57 sts round 4 *k3 p1 k1 ssk p1 k2tog ssk p1 k1 p1 k2tog k1 p1* 12 sts decrease -45 sts round 5 *k3 p1 ssk p1 k2tog twice p1 k2tog p1* 12 sts decrease -33 sts round 6 *k3 p1 ssk twice k2tog p1* 9 sts decrease -24 sts round 7 *k3 p1 cdd p1* 6 sts decrease -18 sts round 8 *k3 cdd* 6 sts decrease -12 sts finishing cut yarn leaving an 8 tail weave tail through remaining live stitches pull tight and secure weave ends in and block to measurements © lana fiber co 2019 all rights reserved charts & legend beanie child/adult small __________________________________________________________________________________________________ charts are read from right to left cable pattern cable crown decrease © lana fiber co 2019 all rights reserved pattern slouch adult medium __________________________________________________________________________________________________ cast on using a twisted german cast on and smaller needles co 92 stitches and join to work in the round making sure not to twist your work place stitch marker for bor ribbing *k2 p1 k1 p1 10 times repeat from * to bor marker work 12 rounds set up round switch to larger needles *k2 p1 k4 p1 k2 p2 k4 p2 k4 p1 repeat from * to bor marker cable pattern *…* pattern repeat round 1 *k2 p1 k4 p1 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc 2/1 lpc p1 k4 p1* round 2 *k2 p1 k4 p2 k4 p2 k2 p1 k4 p1* round 3 *k2 p1 2/2 lc p2 2/2 rc p2
